experince.experience: Cut software rework time by 18%. Decimated production bugs by getting 97% buy-in for test-driven development program. Increased code reliability by 35% and slashed security risk 23%. Built Reliable, Scalable, and Maintainable Applications as a Full stack engineer. Back-end Ruby/Ruby on Rails and Front-end React. Built desktop app with electron. Created  C++ solutions to solve evolving problems. Responsible for Technical Leadership and Mentor-ship, scaling and bug-fixes, cloud platform monitoring, continuous integration and delivery.

Led team of 5 programmers handling end-to-end software development life cycle for 13 client projects. Slashed security breaches 28% by automating standards enforcement. Raised code efficiency 35%. Cut lead times 23%. Raised client retention 35%.  Increased customer satisfaction 25%. Built Reliable, Scalable, and Maintainable Applications. Created and Deployed custom solutions, Test security of Systems, Provide Technical Leadership and Mentor-ship. Write utility programs. Prepare Specification documents and refine requirements. Application Monitoring, Continuous Integration and Delivery.

Work as a full stack software developer. Facilitates training, Write utility programs and mentor upcoming programmers. Develop web application backends with Ruby on rails, worked with electron for cross-platform desktop. Frontend HTML5 and JavaScript. Prepare specification documents, refine requirements and facilitates research and development.

Responsible for providing Network technical support for clients connected to the ISP on demand, handling connectivity issues and general IT support and Reporting. Mentor Industrial Training(IT) Students. Write utility  programs and tasks automation programs with python, C++ and ruby.

projects.shortInfo: Student Leaning  System and School management system. Facilitates learning by providing access to managed  course videos, practice questions, past examination questions. Student use it to solve practice questions, take practice tests, access class continuous assessments, quizzes, assignments,  terminal and mock examinations created by their educators. Includes Recorded videos and Virtual classes features. Performance virtualization of students and class performances over school years and terms. Allows schools to manage their entire learning process, creating classes, assigning educators, and students. Allows parents to track the activities of their kids. I built the back-end API with ruby on rails and front-end with React.
Lokoja First Online  Mall. Marketplace operated in Lokoja, Kogi state, Nigeria. Vendors and customers interaction.

Donation Management System helped the owner (an NGO) to manage donations from their supporters at several levels of membership. Represent them on 8 hierarchy levels promoted based on donations and referrals. The api feeds data to dynamic 365 crm and automates the interation between their call center and the crm. I Built the call center router api and web interface and rest api  with ruby on rails. Mobile app with ionic and angular.
Allows for Doctors and Patience signup, have online interrogations, schedule appointments, get medical prescriptions, and live interactions.

Bar process management app. Allows allocation of routines, sales documentation and checking etc. Gives the admin access to monitor sales and activities of waitress, accountant, kitchen staffs, bartender, snooker man etc.

Legal Case Management System. Allows law firms to subscribe to it and manage the entire legal case processes. Allowing the client to have virtual discussions with the assigned attorneys, with case progress management. I built the whole system with ruby on rails. Etc.

summary:
Hello, I'm a Software Engineer and Computer science enthusiast and B.Tech Computer Science/Cyber Security graduate having 4+ years of experience as Software Development Engineer in Tech firms. As of now I'm involved in developing distributed system software for Storage Management.

I'm passionate about creating simple solutions to complex problems and delivering, clean, test-covered, well-designed and scalable code. I seek to learn and try to apply all of it in a way that makes life easier. I always try to design, develop and deliver technology solutions to problems around me.
qoutes: Your death is something that happens to everyone else.
You only live as long as the last person who remembers you.
Every day every hour turn the pain into power.
If you cannot be a pencil to write someone's happiness, then try to be an eraser to erase someone's sorrows.
helloText:
Dear Visitor, Thank you for visiting my portfolio.

I'm working as Full-Stack Engineer at SmartupTech

Before this I used work as Software Developer at Nativedge. I completed B.Tech Computer Science/Cyber Security at Federal University of Technology Minna .

I'm interested in Algorithms, System Programming, Distributed Systems and Machine Learning. I overwhelmingly like C++, Ruby and Javascript :)

How can I help you?
I can design, develop and deliver technological solutions to your problems.

Do we have something in common? If yes, let's have a talk about it and grow together.

We don't have anything in common?
That's fine,please introduce me to something that I'm missing.
